tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Check if a specific time slot is available on the clinic's Google Calendar. Use this to see if a time works before suggesting it. Current server time: {{now}}

start.description: ISO 8601 start time (e.g., 2026-01-15T14:00:00Z). Must be in UTC.

end.description: ISO 8601 end time (e.g., 2026-01-15T14:30:00Z). Must be in UTC.

duration_minutes.description: How long the appointment should be in minutes (default: 30)

tools.name: book_appointment
tools.description: Book the patient into the clinic's Google Calendar once they have confirmed the time. This creates a calendar event and sends an invite to the patient.

patient_name.description: Full name of the patient (e.g., 'John Smith')

patient_email.description: Patient's email address for the calendar invite

start.description: ISO 8601 start time (e.g., 2026-01-15T14:00:00Z). Must be in UTC.

end.description: ISO 8601 end time (e.g., 2026-01-15T14:30:00Z). Must be in UTC.

notes.description: Any special notes from the patient call (e.g., 'Mentioned they're a referral from Dr. Smith')

tools.name: get_available_slots
tools.description: Get available time slots within a date range. Use this to suggest multiple options to the patient.

slot_duration_minutes.description: Duration of each slot in minutes (default: 30)

description: Voxanne Calendar Integration - Handles real-time calendar availability checks and appointment booking
